### Remote Traveller Processing Request for Information (RFI) Announcement

#### Tender Reference
 PW-23-01028658

#### Publication Date
 2 March 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
 31 March 2023 at 14:00:00

#### Classification
 Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): N7030 - ADP Software
 UNSPSC: Not Applicable

#### Description
 The Canada Revenue Agency is seeking feedback from industry, regarding information on technology and hardware solutions for remote border management capabilities, including:

* Image capturing
* Document reader functionality
* Remote control of hardware (gates and lights)
* Multimodal communication (voice, text, video)
* Physical considerations for optimal sound in call/command centers
* Software for managing calls

The objective of this Request for Information (RFI) is to collect market readiness and industry capabilities specific to the Remote Traveller Processing (RTP) concept and technology solution for small and remote ports of entry.

#### Requested Information
 Canada Revenue Agency is seeking information on technologies and hardware solutions that meet the requirements outlined above. Industry stakeholders are encouraged to submit feedback in the form of written comments or proposals.
